channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
channel.description:
_[This is a revamp of the Marshal Suggestion (When he was removed)](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-marshal-neutral-offensive-updated-2-2-2018/40440)_
**The Ranger: Neutral Investigative** **Goal: Exterminate All Non-Killer Neutrals before they win the game.**
**Passives:**
**Retired Blue Dragon:** This class cant be converted and always will be not suspicious for Blue Dragon investigative classes, the ranger will never be able to vote someone for treason or pardon/execution.
**You Can Not Fool me:** If during court the Scorned/Fool Uses Trollbox, you will know that message was not a real one, you will not know who made the Trollbox.
**Day Ability**
**Veteran Sights:** Check somebody, if he frames a player (or themself) you will know it, Infinite uses. The ability will keep investigating the same player until you chose another one
**Night abilities:**
**Expert persecution:** Check a Player, if he is Neutral, you will know. Infinite uses
**Chaos Ending:** Target a Player, if He is Neutral, you will end their missery. Bypasses All Immunities, Heal will save the target. If you hit the Neutral killer, it will not die. 3 Uses.
**Strategy:**
Fool and Scorned are your main enemies, find them fast and kill them before they accomplish their goals!
You cant kill the Neutral Killer, and he is not your target.
Blue Dragon will always want you on their team, so claiming Ranger will not be bad for you.
**Class Explanation:**
The Ranger is a retired member of the Blue Dragon. He only wants one thing: Peace on the court. And he will do whatever it takes to achieve his goal.
Maybe he is not a young man anymore, but he is still an expert, and he still knows how to do his job.
Ranger will commit suicide if a Non-Killer Neutral wins in mid-game.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
How about we don’t make a neutral counter

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Sharvax
item.description:
How about making it so he cant vote? That would make him less “Pro-BD” and the conversion thing wouldnt matter.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
“Ok I hate neutrals claiming D1 so here is a neutral that can claim D1. That will solve all of our problems”

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Alchemist who’s also a inq target with this class in the game

HAVE FUN

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Uh I meant #deathtoalch

Don’t hurt me plz

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
What is the purpose of your class? This heavily nerfs all other neutrals except NK, without giving any compensation to them either. Don’t you think this is very unfun for the Alchemist that just happens to face this class? First of all this should be unique, because now a lone Alchemist, could face two of these bastards. Second, they should not count towards the neutral limit, since they are basically another BD class with this design.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Scorned is a bad neutral right now you shouldn’t do something just cause another class is being bad. Scorned is even worse due to being confirmable.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Not good enough, he literally is PRO BD and unconvertible.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: 4lan
item.description:
I already fixed it, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
So what you are saying is there is no counter play to this class and that neutrals will hate you.

Doesn’t need to be occupy immune when stabbing someone, doesn’t need to bypass immunity.

Also you should only check to see if someone is neutral, not occupy them.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: 4lan
item.description:
He appears as Killer Offensive Neutral in investigation.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
This class would have to be distinctly anti-BD in order for it to be fair (high chance of being lynched), otherwise it would just be a neutrals lose game everytime he spawned.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Nuts out!

If pretender and inquisitor wasn’t hard enough.

Please don’t make a counter neutral class.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ranger [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: 4lan
item.description:
This is a revamp of the Marshal Suggestion (When he was removed)

The Ranger: Neutral Investigative
Goal: Exterminate All Non-Killer Neutrals before they win the game.

Passives:

Retired Blue Dragon:
This class cant be converted and always will be not suspicious for Blue Dragon investigative classes, the ranger will never be able to vote someone for treason or pardon/execution.

You Can Not Fool me:
If during court the Scorned/Fool Uses Trollbox, you will know that message was not a real one, you will not know who made the Trollbox.

Day Ability

Veteran Sights: Check somebody, if he frames a player (or themself) you will know it, Infinite uses. The ability will keep investigating the same player until you chose another one

Night abilities:

Expert persecution:
Check a Player, if he is Neutral, you will know. Infinite uses

Chaos Ending:
Target a Player, if He is Neutral, you will end their missery. Bypasses All Immunities, Heal will save the target. If you hit the Neutral killer, it will not die. 3 Uses.

Fool and Scorned are your main enemies, find them fast and kill them before they accomplish their goals!

You cant kill the Neutral Killer, and he is not your target.

Blue Dragon will always want you on their team, so claiming Ranger will not be bad for you.

Class Explanation:

The Ranger is a retired member of the Blue Dragon. He only wants one thing: Peace on the court. And he will do whatever it takes to achieve his goal.

Maybe he is not a young man anymore, but he is still an expert, and he still knows how to do his job.

Ranger will commit suicide if a Non-Killer Neutral wins in mid-game.
